reviews.sentence: Apathetic. I have stayed here a few times recently. I am a Diamond member with Hyat so have a reasonable expectation that some basic requests be fulfilled. I have only one thing on my reservation profile which is quiet room. There are quiet rooms in the property those facing the pool and courtyard. However rooms facing McBean parkway are extremely loud. So whoever assigned rooms clearly did not care. Others have mentioned the workout room. Half of the Lifesystem equipment is dead and has remained so over the last 3 weeks despite multiple comments including those of others here and some I witnessed at the front desk while personally making the same request. On this last stay it was clear no repair has even been attempted the same bare wires were hanging out weeks laterA topper albeit minor. At breakfast when asked if it was possible to get a latte not exactly an exotic request we were informed that there was nobody manning the espresso machine so they could not do it. Well that kind of put things over the top. I had a long polite conversation with the manager who took my information and promised to get back to me. 9 days later and no communication. I appear to be confusing them with people who care. Needless to say not planning on returning.
not worth it. In desperate need of renovation. Tub did not drain well. Noisy street outside.
Nice little hotel. Very nice hotel that is quiet. The only drawback to this facility is that it needs a little updating. But overall it was a very nice stay.

Every staff person from the front desk to the wait staff in the bar and restaurant was friendly polite and helpful. During our stay the pool was closed for renovation and the outdoor dining patio was closed for a private event. I suspect that because we got such an inexpensive rate we were given a room in the worst location for traffic noise.

Very old hotel with antiquated interior. This Hyat Regency hotel seems to be an elderly hotel. Service and friendliness of the staff members was ok. But they need to refurbish their interior especially of the rooms urgently. But nevertheless you could notice that some renovation is going on in this hotel. I booked one of their suites which was clean so far but not spacious enough and in my mind did not deserve to be called a suite. Breakfast was below average only they didn‘t offer a wide selection of breakfast ingredients.

High end hotel with beautiful grounds and amenities. Although showing it is age the hotel still charges to dollar as renovations move forward at a snails pace. Despite this the hotel remains an excellent choice for weddings and other such affairs.

would have given 5 stars but. Under renovation so you will hear construction noise. Otherwise would have given five stars. Great staff great location I would recommend this hotel once renovation is done.

Though older and a little outdated the place was spotless and the staff were outstanding. This was one of my better stays with Hyat. They are in the middle of remodeling the restaurant and bar area. Seems the Hyat made due with the renovations and are bending over backwards to accommodate the customers. Great stay food was good drinks were perfect and staff outstanding.

Great location nice rooms fantastic staff. I can not say enough positive about this property. Recent remodeling provides for nice rooms restaurant and lobby experience but it is the staff that truly make the difference as far as customer service. Thank you.

Set a magic dust for reconstruction made no dif. Everyone was awesome. The main Resturant was under remodel which a bit noisy during the day but no noise at night. The staff and area made up for any construction Inconvenience.

Returning to better days. Property has been turning around again after this completed renovation of the rooms and restaurant. Way different than last stay. Greater Pacific has a great vibe and good fod and the bar is pretty lively especially when the game is on cool happy hour too. Rooms are nicely renovated and fresh and modern I got a decent rate too. Staff is excellent and what a Hyat Regency should represent gave off a more formal and high end vibe especially staff Daniel who was so courteous and helpful he even upgraded us to a view room. When in SCV defintely stay here.
Local simple get away. AMAZING. I live very close. Hotel was remodeled and I love it even more. Great spot just to get away.
Clean but needs to be updated.

Excellent Service. Stayed here for 2 nights on a business trip. The room was updated and clean. The service by the majority of employees was excellent especially restaurant and valet employees. I would definitely stay here again.

Not as expected. The food is good and room was good BUTIce machine did not work and was told would send maintenance but never came. when I called again told “ go to another flor”Robe was torn and had stainRom had a lot of traffic noise.

Nice stopover hotel and bar in Valencia. Worth a look when traveling to the roller coasters or business in the SC valley nice update to bar and ask if Reane is tending great friendly service all around and check out the happy hour too with live music on weekends.
Renovated rooms are nice. Nice garden meeting area in back.

THIS IS AN AWESOME HOTEL. We have stayed here several times and always have a great experience. Our check in experience was amazing as always. The on site restaurant has been remodeled and looks fantastic. The location of this hotel is incredible as its within walking distance to the Mall Target and several restaurants including Olive Garden Red Robin BJs as well as a very nice movie theater. There is Valet parking available for 140 per night but we park in the adjacent parking garage for FREE. The pool and jacuzi are quite beautiful see photo. We were given a room upgrade for being WORLD OF HYAT members awesome program. Which included some cool features like the time illuminated on bathroom mirror reading lights on both sides of bed and in room refrigerator with glass door see photos. The bed was quite comfortable too. If you need a hotel in VALENCIA SANTA CLARITA area LOOK NO FURTHER. This is a perfect choice.

Impressed. It was amazing. I was very impressed how clean it was and nice and updated. I ’ve stayed at other Hyat ’s I Other cities and it was n’t that nice. I would recommend upgrading for the breakfast though. Because a coffee is 30. So that was n’t worth it. The area was a business and at night it was kind of noisy.

Newly Renovated Hotel in the Heart of Valencia. We recently stayed at the Hyat Valencia because one of our good friends was getting married at a venue a few miles away. After researching a few hotels in the area the Hyat seems to be one of the only full service 4star hotels in the area. Check in We booked the Corner Suite online with the Romance Package which included breakfast a bottle of champagne chocolate covered strawberries. Check in was fast efficient and our room was ready at around 3 pm. Room. The whole hotel has been recently renovated aligns with the new design aesthetic of the Hyat. Our Corner Suite was located on the 4th floor overlooked the major intersection the hotel sits on. The rooms are clean modern with high quality furnishings throughout. The bathrooms feature a nice walk in shower modern touches like a back lit LED mirror. The bedding was incredible felt very similar to the Four Seasons bedding. The room featured a small living area that was partially separated from the bedroom. There were two small Juilete balcony with sliding doors that could be opened to get some airflow into the room. Despite being one of their top suites we found the actual location of the corner suite to be very noisy lacked privacy. We typically like to sleep with the curtains open from the bed you constantly get cars headlights shining at you while you sleep even from the 4th floor and the constant sound of revving engines at 4 am. If you are booking a room pick the golf course mountain view as this side of the building has the best views is the most quite. Service. The level of service at the Hyat Valencia is what you expect from most 4star hotel brands friendly efficient. Despite the hotel being packed with guests we felt the hotel was understaffed. Even though we valeted our car for the duration of our trip we could never locate the valet attendant. On Saturday night we went down to the bar with friends to grab a bite to eat. The menu stated the kitchen was open till 11 pm. When we placed our order at 945 pm the bartender told us the chef went home the kitchen was closed. Location. The hotel is situated in the heart of Valencia with Six Flags a short 5minute drive away the local mall right across the street. For those looking for dining options in Valencia you can walk across the street to the mall choose from Larsens Steakhouse BJs Saddle Back Ranch Cheesecake Factory. Breakfast. Our room rate package included a breakfast buffet at the hotels restaurant Greater Pacific. The buffet offered pancakes potatoes scrambled eggs bacon sausages. In addition they also had a small yogurt station a small selection of pastries. Once seated you could also order eggs any style with your waiter.
